meanings.definition: A meeting in which participants communicate via video technology.
meanings.sent1: During the videoconferences, everyone could see each other on the screen.
meanings.sent2: We had a videoconference with our colleagues from different offices.
meanings.sent3: The videoconferences felt like talking to friends through a magic window.
meanings.sent4: In the world of videoconferences, distance disappears and faces come closer.
meanings.sent5: The videoconferences were like having a virtual gathering in our living rooms.

meanings.definition: To participate in a meeting using video technology.
meanings.sent1: She videoconferences with her team every Monday morning.
meanings.sent2: We will videoconference with the client to discuss the project details.
meanings.sent3: He videoconferences so often that his cat now recognizes the sound of the call.
meanings.sent4: Videoconferencing allows us to connect instantly across the globe.
meanings.sent5: They videoconference regularly to stay in touch with their international partners.
